analyzed: U   U   U
namaḥ loka īśvarāya
mad ādi aśeṣa mūḍhānām yasya vacana raśmibhiḥ

original: phullatāmeti hṛtpadmaṃ taṃ vande puruṣottamam // Csp_1 //
analyzed: phulla tām eti hṛd padmam tam vande puruṣottamam

original: pāramiṃ guhyamantraṃ ca śritvā bodhiḥ prasidhyati /
analyzed: pāramim guhya mantram ca śritvā bodhiḥ prasidhyati
guru buddha uktitaḥ tu evam tad arthaḥ likhyate mayā
guhya mantraḥ tra naḥ vācyaḥ pāramī naya cārikāḥ
bodhisattvasya caryāḥ tu samāsena likhāmi aham
dhīmataḥ saṃvaraḥ grāhyaḥ bodhi citta puras saraḥ
ālokya aśeṣa sūtrāṇi śāstram śravyam samastakam

original: kāyena manasā vācā yathoktān saṃvarān tribhiḥ /
analyzed: kāyena manasā vācā yathā uktān saṃvarān tribhiḥ
rakṣet akṣuṇṇa śuddhān ca śīlān ca pariśodhayet
bhakta mātrām vijānīyāt indriya dvāram āvaret

original: rātreḥ pūrve 'pare bhāge na suptvā yogamācaret // Csp_6 //
analyzed: rātreḥ pūrve pare bhāge na suptvā yogam ācaret
aṇu mātreṣu avadyeṣu hi atimātram bibheti ca

original: rātrerbhāgatrayaṃ kṛtvā hyantye bhāge tu jāgṛyāt // Csp_7 //
analyzed: rātreḥ bhāga trayam kṛtvā hi antye bhāge tu jāgṛyāt
prakṣālayet mukha ādīn vā ākṣālanam vā api yujyate

original: sukhāsanaṃ samāśritya dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ smaret // Csp_8 //
analyzed: sukha āsanam samāśritya dharmāṇām dharma tām smaret
nimittaiḥ śakye tu utthāya ābhāsa vastuṣu
māyāvat tvena samprekṣya puṇya yogān tad antare
pūrayet ca api sapta aṅgān vipulām praṇidhim caret

original: bhāvayed bhāvanāṃ pūrvā kāle 'tha bhojanasya ca // Csp_10 //
analyzed: bhāvayet bhāvanām pūrvā kāle bhojanasya ca
etat niḥ sāra kāyena param sāram gaveṣayan

original: kāyaṃ naukādhiyā rakṣed na bhuṅktāṃ sthūlatākṛte // Csp_11 //
analyzed: kāyam naukā dhiyā rakṣet na bhuṅktām sthūla tā kṛte

original: rasāsaktyā na bhuñjīta caturdhānnaṃ vibhajya ca /
analyzed: rasa āsaktyā na bhuñjīta caturdhā annam vibhajya ca
devebhyaḥ vinivedya ādim dharmapālāya tat param
balim su vipulām dadyāt śeṣam sva bhukta pītataḥ
dadyāt ca sarva bhūtebhyaḥ kathā tantram tad antare
kuryāt adbhuta vārttā ca kiñcid utthāya sañcaret
parikrāmet adhiṣṭhānam japam vā grantha vācanam

original: sugatapratimāṃ kuryād yāvat svedo na jāyate /
analyzed: sugata pratimām kuryāt yāvat svedaḥ na jāyate

original: kuryāt, pradakṣiṇāṃ tāvad akṣubdhaḥ praṇidhiṃ bahum // Csp_15 //
analyzed: kuryāt pradakṣiṇām tāvat a kṣubdhaḥ praṇidhim bahum
dharma caryāḥ daśa proktāḥ maitreyeṇa samāsatas
caret akṣipta cittena māyā aupamyam ca saṃsmaran

original: yadi syāt pūjayet saṅghaṃ kuryād vā bālakotsavam /
analyzed: yadi syāt pūjayet saṅgham kuryāt vā bālaka utsavam

original: anāthebhyaḥ sudānaṃ tu yogine puṇyasañcayaḥ // Csp_17 //
analyzed: anāthebhyaḥ sudānam tu yogine puṇya sañcayaḥ

original: pūrṇeṣu dinakṛtyeṣu bhāge ca prathame niśaḥ /
analyzed: pūrṇeṣu dinakṛtyeṣu bhāge ca prathame niśaḥ

original: dharmatā niṣprapañcāpi tathā cittaṃ ca yojayet // Csp_18 //
analyzed: dharmatā niṣprapañcā api tathā cittam ca yojayet
